trans-unit.source: Contains properties that are used to constrain the set of <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance"></xref> objects returned by a call to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 包含属性用于约束的一套<xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance"></xref>到调用所返回的对象<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=fullName>。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] A SqlTrackingQueryOptions contains properties that are used to constrain the set of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> objects returned by the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method against the tracking data in a database used by the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]SqlTrackingQueryOptions 包含用于约束的一套<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance>通过<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=fullName>对由<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService>数据库中的跟踪数据的方法</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=fullName>返回的对象</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance>的属性

trans-unit.source: Each <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> in the collection of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> objects returned by a call to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=fullName> must correspond to a workflow instance which has tracking data associated with it in the database that meets the conditions specified by the properties of the SqlTrackingQueryOptions.
trans-unit.target: 每个<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance>的集合中<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance>到调用所返回的对象<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=fullName>必须对应于具有跟踪数据与之关联的数据库中满足 SqlTrackingQueryOptions 的属性指定的条件的工作流实例。</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions> class.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions>类</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions>实例的初始属性的值

trans-unit.source: |Property|Value| |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMaxDateTime%2A>|<xref:System.DateTime.MaxValue>.| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMinDateTime%2A>|<xref:System.DateTime.MinValue>.| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.TrackingDataItems%2A>|An empty <xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601>.| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus%2A>|A null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowType%2A>|A null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).| These values specify that a call to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=fullName> should return a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> object for every workflow instance that has tracking data in the database.
trans-unit.target: |属性 |值 | |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMaxDateTime%2A>|<xref:System.DateTime.MaxValue>.| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMinDateTime%2A>|<xref:System.DateTime.MinValue>.| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.TrackingDataItems%2A>|一个空<xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601>。 | |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus%2A>|空引用 (`Nothing`在 Visual Basic 中)。 | |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowType%2A>|空引用 (`Nothing`在 Visual Basic 中)。 | 这些值指定调用<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=fullName>应返回<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance>的每个工作流实例具有跟踪数据库中的数据的对象。</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowType%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus%2A> </xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.TrackingDataItems%2A> </xref:System.DateTime.MinValue> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMinDateTime%2A> </xref:System.DateTime.MaxValue> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMaxDateTime%2A>

trans-unit.source: Resets the properties of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions"></xref> to their default values.
trans-unit.target: 重置的属性<xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions"></xref>为其默认值。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions> class.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions>类</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions>实例的初始属性的值

trans-unit.source: |Property|Value| |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMaxDateTime%2A>|<xref:System.DateTime.MaxValue>.| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMinDateTime%2A>|<xref:System.DateTime.MinValue>.| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.TrackingDataItems%2A>|An empty <xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601>.| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus%2A>|A null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowType%2A>|A null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).| These values specify that a call to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=fullName> should return a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> object for every workflow instance that has tracking data in the database.
trans-unit.target: |属性 |值 | |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMaxDateTime%2A>|<xref:System.DateTime.MaxValue>.| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMinDateTime%2A>|<xref:System.DateTime.MinValue>.| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.TrackingDataItems%2A>|一个空<xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601>。 | |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus%2A>|空引用 (`Nothing`在 Visual Basic 中)。 | |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowType%2A>|空引用 (`Nothing`在 Visual Basic 中)。 | 这些值指定调用<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=fullName>应返回<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance>的每个工作流实例具有跟踪数据库中的数据的对象。</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowType%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus%2A> </xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.TrackingDataItems%2A> </xref:System.DateTime.MinValue> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMinDateTime%2A> </xref:System.DateTime.MaxValue> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMaxDateTime%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <xref:System.DateTime> that specifies the upper limit of the time period that, together with <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, is used to constrain the set of <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance"></xref> objects returned by a call to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置<xref:System.DateTime>，它指定的时间段的上限，连同<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus%2A?displayProperty=fullName>，它用于约束的一套<xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance"></xref>到调用所返回的对象<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=fullName>。</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions> constrains the set of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> objects returned by a call to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=fullName> to those workflow instances that have the <xref:System.Type> specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowType%2A>, that have the status specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus%2A> during the period specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMinDateTime%2A> and StatusMaxDateTime, and that have extracted data that matches at least one of the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItemValue> objects specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.TrackingDataItems%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions>约束的一套<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance><xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=fullName>对这些工作流实例具有<xref:System.Type>由<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowType%2A>、，具有指定状态的<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus%2A>由<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMinDateTime%2A>和 StatusMaxDateTime，且必须提取的数据匹配的<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItemValue>对象指定<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.TrackingDataItems%2A>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.TrackingDataItems%2A></xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItemValue>的至少一个</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMinDateTime%2A>指定时间段内</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus%2A></xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowType%2A>指定</xref:System.Type>的</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=fullName>调用返回对象</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance></xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DateTime> value specified by StatusMaxDateTime is inclusive.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DateTime>StatusMaxDateTime 由指定的值是包括在内。</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: For more information about how the status of a workflow instance is matched, see the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 有关如何匹配工作流实例的状态的详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus%2A>属性。</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If `WorkflowStatus` is set to null, then `StatusMaxDateTime` and `StatusMinDateTime` are ignored.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 如果`WorkflowStatus`设置为 null，则`StatusMaxDateTime`和`StatusMinDateTime`将被忽略。

trans-unit.source: All workflow instances will be returned when `GetWorkflows` is called.
trans-unit.target: 所有工作流实例时将返回`GetWorkflows`调用。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.DateTime> that specifies the upper limit of the time period used for matching workflow instances with a status specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus*>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DateTime>指定用于匹配工作流实例的指定<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus*>。</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus*>的状态的时间段的上限</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref:System.DateTime.MinValue?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref:System.DateTime.MinValue?displayProperty=fullName>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <xref:System.DateTime> that, together with <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, is used to constrain the set of <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance"></xref> objects returned by a call to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置<xref:System.DateTime>，连同<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus%2A?displayProperty=fullName>，它用于约束的一套<xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance"></xref>到调用所返回的对象<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=fullName>。</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions> constrains the set of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> objects returned by a call to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=fullName> to those workflow instances that have the <xref:System.Type> specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowType%2A>, that have the status specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus%2A> during the period specified by StatusMinDateTime and <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMaxDateTime%2A>, and that have extracted data that matches at least one of the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItemValue> objects specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.TrackingDataItems%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions>约束的一套<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance>到调用所返回的对象<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=fullName>到这些工作流实例具有<xref:System.Type>指定的<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowType%2A>，具有由指定的状态<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus%2A>StatusMinDateTime 由指定期间和<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMaxDateTime%2A>，和的已提取数据相匹配的<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItemValue>对象指定<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.TrackingDataItems%2A>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.TrackingDataItems%2A></xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItemValue>中至少一个</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMaxDateTime%2A></xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus%2A></xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowType%2A></xref:System.Type></xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance></xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DateTime> value specified by StatusMinDateTime is inclusive.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DateTime>StatusMinDateTime 由指定的值是包括在内。</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: For more information about how the status of a workflow instance is matched, see the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 有关如何匹配工作流实例的状态的详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus%2A>属性。</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If `WorkflowStatus` is set to null, then `StatusMaxDateTime` and `StatusMinDateTime` are ignored.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 如果`WorkflowStatus`设置为 null，则`StatusMaxDateTime`和`StatusMinDateTime`将被忽略。

trans-unit.source: All workflow instances will be returned when `GetWorkflows` is called.
trans-unit.target: 所有工作流实例时将返回`GetWorkflows`调用。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.DateTime> that specifies the lower limit of the time period used for matching workflow instances with a status specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus*>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DateTime>指定用于匹配工作流实例的指定<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus*>。</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus*>的状态的时间段的下限</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref:System.DateTime.MinValue?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref:System.DateTime.MinValue?displayProperty=fullName>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a list of data extract values which are used to constrain the set of <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance"></xref> objects returned by a call to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置数据提取值的列表，可供使用约束的一套<xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance"></xref>到调用所返回的对象<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=fullName>。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions> constrains the set of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> objects returned by a call to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=fullName> to those workflow instances that have the <xref:System.Type> specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowType%2A>, that have the status specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus%2A> during the period specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMinDateTime%2A> and <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMaxDateTime%2A>, and that have extracted data that matches at least one of the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItemValue> objects specified by TrackingDataItems.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions>约束的一套<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance>到调用所返回的对象<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=fullName>到这些工作流实例具有<xref:System.Type>指定的<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowType%2A>，具有由指定的状态<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus%2A>期间指定的时期<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMinDateTime%2A>和<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMaxDateTime%2A>，，必须提取与至少一个匹配的数据和<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItemValue>TrackingDataItems 由指定的对象。</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItemValue> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMaxDateTime%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMinDateTime%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowType%2A> </xref:System.Type> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance></xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord.Body%2A?displayProperty=fullName> or <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingRecord.Body%2A?displayProperty=fullName> can contain <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItem> records that contain data that is extracted from the workflow.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord.Body%2A?displayProperty=fullName>或<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingRecord.Body%2A?displayProperty=fullName>可以包含<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItem>包含从流中提取的数据的记录。</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItem> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingRecord.Body%2A?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord.Body%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The TrackingDataItems property contains <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItemValue> objects that specify certain values for this extracted data.
trans-unit.target: TrackingDataItems 属性包含<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItemValue>此指定特定值的对象的已提取数据。</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItemValue>

trans-unit.source: If the workflow instance meets the other criteria specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions> and TrackingDataItems is not a null reference (`Nothing`), the extracted data stored in the database for a workflow instance must match one or more of the extracted data values specified by the TrackingDataItems property for a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> object to be returned for the workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: 如果工作流实例满足指定的其他条件<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions>和 TrackingDataItems 不是 null 引用 (`Nothing`)、 提取工作流实例的数据库中存储的数据必须匹配一个或多个已提取的数据值指定的 TrackingDataItems 属性<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance>工作流实例返回的对象。</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions>

trans-unit.source: If TrackingDataItems is a null reference (`Nothing`), the set of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> objects returned will not be constrained by the values of the extracted data for any of the workflow instances in the database.
trans-unit.target: 如果 TrackingDataItems 为空引用 (`Nothing`) 的一套<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance>返回的对象将不受任何工作流实例在数据库中提取的数据的值。</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601> of <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItemValue"></xref> objects that contains specified values to be matched for data extracted from the workflow instance or a null reference (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601>的<xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItemValue"></xref>包含的对象指定要为从工作流实例或 null 引用中提取数据匹配的值 (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""> </xref>在 Visual Basic 中)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus"></xref> value that is used to constrain the set of <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance"></xref> objects returned by a call to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置<xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus"></xref>值用于约束的一套<xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance"></xref>到调用所返回的对象<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=fullName>。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions> constrains the set of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> objects returned by a call to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=fullName> to those workflow instances that have the <xref:System.Type> specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowType%2A>, that have the status specified by WorkflowStatus during the period specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMinDateTime%2A> and <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMaxDateTime%2A>, and that have extracted data that matches at least one of the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItemValue> objects specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.TrackingDataItems%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions>约束的一套<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance>到调用所返回的对象<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=fullName>到这些工作流实例具有<xref:System.Type>指定的<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowType%2A>，具有由指定期间指定的工作流状态的状态<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMinDateTime%2A>和<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMaxDateTime%2A>，和的已提取数据相匹配的<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItemValue>对象指定<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.TrackingDataItems%2A>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.TrackingDataItems%2A></xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItemValue>中至少一个</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMaxDateTime%2A></xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMinDateTime%2A></xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowType%2A></xref:System.Type></xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance></xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions>

trans-unit.source: A workflow instance is considered to have a status that matches WorkflowStatus if the last <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord> received for that workflow instance before or during the specified time period has its <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord.TrackingWorkflowEvent%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property set to a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent> value that maps to the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus?displayProperty=fullName> value specified by WorkflowStatus.
trans-unit.target: 工作流实例被视为具有匹配工作流状态，如果的状态上次<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord>收到针对该工作流实例之前或在指定时间段内具有其<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord.TrackingWorkflowEvent%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性设置为<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>值映射到<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus?displayProperty=fullName>指定工作流状态的值。</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord.TrackingWorkflowEvent%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile> for the workflow instance must have a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint> that is configured for the appropriate <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent?displayProperty=fullName> value.
trans-unit.target: 因此，<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>工作流实例所必须拥有<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint>配置的相应<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent?displayProperty=fullName>值。</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>

trans-unit.source: Only <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent> values that have been sent in workflow tracking records can be matched.
trans-unit.target: 仅<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>可以匹配已发送跟踪记录的工作流中的值。</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>

trans-unit.source: If no workflow tracking records have been sent for the workflow instance, the workflow instance is considered to have a status of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 如果已为工作流实例不发送任何工作流跟踪记录，工作流实例被视为具有<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus?displayProperty=fullName>状态

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the mapping between <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent> values and <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus> values.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示之间的映射<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>值和<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus>值。</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>

trans-unit.source: |TrackingWorkflowEvent value|WorkflowStatus value| |---------------------------------|--------------------------| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>|<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus>| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>|<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus>| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>|<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus>| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>|<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus>| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>|<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus>| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>|<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus>| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>|<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus>| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>|<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus>| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>|<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus>| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>|<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus>| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>|<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus>| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>|<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus>| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>|<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus>| If WorkflowStatus is null (`Nothing`), the set of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> objects returned will not be constrained by status; in other words, a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> object will be returned for any workflow instance that matches the parameters specified by the other properties of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions>.
trans-unit.target: |TrackingWorkflowEvent 值 |WorkflowStatus 值 | |---------------------------------|--------------------------| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>|<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus>| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>|<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus>| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>|<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus>| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>|<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus>| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>|<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus>| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>|<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus>| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>|<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus>| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>|<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus>| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>|<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus>| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>|<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus>| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>|<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus>| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>|<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus>| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>|<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus>| 如果工作流状态为 null (`Nothing`) 的一套<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance>返回的对象将不会受状态约束; 换句话说，<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance>将为<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions>的其他属性所指定参数匹配的任何工作流实例返回的对象</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance></xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance></xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus></xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent></xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus></xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent></xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus></xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent></xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus></xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent></xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus></xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent></xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus></xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent></xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus></xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent></xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus></xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent></xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus></xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent></xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus></xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent></xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus></xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent></xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus></xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent></xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus></xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus"></xref> values or null (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: 之一<xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus"></xref>值或 null (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""> </xref>在 Visual Basic 中)。

trans-unit.source: The default is null (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref>).
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 null (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref>)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the workflow instance <xref:System.Type> that is used to constrain the set of <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance"></xref> objects returned by a call to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置工作流实例<xref:System.Type>，用于约束的一套<xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance"></xref>到调用所返回的对象<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=fullName>。</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions> constrains the set of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> objects returned by a call to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=fullName> to those workflow instances that have the <xref:System.Type> specified by WorkflowType, that have the status specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus%2A> during the period specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMinDateTime%2A> and <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMaxDateTime%2A>, and that have extracted data that matches at least one of the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItemValue> objects specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.TrackingDataItems%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions>约束的一套<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance>到调用所返回的对象<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=fullName>到这些工作流实例具有<xref:System.Type>WorkflowType，具有由指定的状态由指定<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus%2A>期间指定的时期<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMinDateTime%2A>和<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMaxDateTime%2A>，和的已提取数据相匹配的<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItemValue>对象指定<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.TrackingDataItems%2A>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.TrackingDataItems%2A></xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItemValue>中至少一个</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMaxDateTime%2A></xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMinDateTime%2A></xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus%2A></xref:System.Type></xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance></xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions>

trans-unit.source: If WorkflowType is a null reference (`Nothing`), the set of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> objects returned will not be constrained by workflow <xref:System.Type>; in other words, a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> object will be returned for any workflow instance that matches the parameters specified by the other properties of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions>.
trans-unit.target: 如果 WorkflowType 为空引用 (`Nothing`)，<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance>返回的对象将不受工作流<xref:System.Type>; 换而言之，<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance>对象将在匹配参数指定<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions>的其他属性的任何工作流实例返回</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance></xref:System.Type>约束</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance>的集

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Type>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Type>.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: The default is a null reference (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: 默认值为空引用 (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""> </xref>在 Visual Basic 中)。
